name: Designer Baby
description:
You've got a child on the way! And good news, you can customize it to be just the way you like. Though beware, it can be a bit expensive and you won't always get what you want, but you 

A game about gene editing and its consequences. 

Credits
Kathy Yang - Music / Artist
Annie Chang - Character Artist
Misha - Code / UI
Evan Shi - Code / UI
Amy Gill - Artist / Writer
